name: Mausser Chemical Streamer
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Mausser Particle Streamer" "122443" #L "Hacker Tool" "87814" #L "Sheet of Curved Carbonum Plating" "156017" #L "Composite Barrel" "137236" #L "Compression Chamber for Chemicals" "137248" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Hacker Tool + Mausser Particle Streamer = #L "Mausser Particle Streamer Base" "157718" Skills: | BE | ------------------------------ Compression Chamber for Chemicals + Mausser Particle Streamer Base = #L "Mausser Chemical Streamer - Step 1" "157720" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Composite Barrel + Mausser Chemical Streamer - Step 1 = #L "Mausser Chemical Streamer - Step 2" "157722" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Sheet of Curved Carbonum Plating + Mausser Chemical Streamer - Step 2 = #L "Mausser Chemical Streamer" "157716" Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ This weapon can only be built. It increases the damage of the mausser, but in addition it inflicts chemical damage and its clip is slightly larger. A very good weapon.
